accountLocked.message: Your account has been temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please contact your administrator to regain access.

profilePhoto.title: Add Profile Photo
profilePhoto.subtitle: Capture or select a photo for your profile
profilePhoto.noImageSelected: Please select or capture a photo to continue
profilePhoto.libraryNotInstalled: Image picker library is not installed
profilePhoto.cameraError: Failed to capture photo. Please try again.
profilePhoto.galleryError: Failed to select photo. Please try again.
profilePhoto.saveError: Failed to save profile photo. Please try again.

firstTimeLogin.title: Update your name and password
firstTimeLogin.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
firstTimeLogin.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
firstTimeLogin.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 14 characters
firstTimeLogin.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
firstTimeLogin.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
firstTimeLogin.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
firstTimeLogin.passwordSymbol: Password must contain at least one symbol (@$!%*?&)
firstTimeLogin.agreementText: By clicking on continue you agree to our

permissions.title: Permission

location.title: Location
location.description: Location related permissions are required to capture and display your location to provide with accurate data at the time of check in check out.

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: Storage permission is required so that any kind of files or any other documents can easily be downloaded, uploaded, shared or saved to your phone, which you need to collaborate with your teammates

camera.title: Camera
camera.description: Permission to access camera is required so that you can easily scan or capture any document and send it to anyone within organization directly without any browsing requirement. This will ensure that you are provided with a seamless experience while using our application.

timeCapture.title: Time Capture
timeCapture.description: Permission to access your device clock is required to capture the exact time of your attendance so that we can display the exact time of check in and check out

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.description: Personal information related permission will allow us to collect user email & photo to login into the app. This information's are required as a part of registration process. Our app also collects mobile number for verification to check the active SIM status of the device.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: By giving device id permission nobody can use my credentials to login from other devices

microphone.title: Microphone
microphone.description: Colab requires access to your microphone to enable clear audio during voice and video calls.

phoneCall.title: Phone Call
phoneCall.description: Colab requires access to your phone to manage call connectivity and enhance communication features

permissions.privacyAgreement: You agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions

otp.emailMessage: Please enter the six digit verification code sent to your email {{email}}
otp.aadhaarMessage: Face verification failed. Please enter the six digit OTP sent to your email {{email}} to verify your Aadhaar.
otp.loginDescription: Please enter the six-digit code sent to your email and mobile. The OTP is valid for 5 minutes.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.confirmPasswordEmpty: Confirm password should not be empty
changePassword.passwordSameAsEmail: Password cannot be same as user ID
changePassword.passwordFormat: Use minimum 14 characters with a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers & symbols (@$!%*?&)
changePassword.passwordHint: Use minimum 14 characters with a mix of letters (uppercase, lowercase), numbers & symbols.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.openedInBrowser: The privacy policy has been opened in your browser.
privacy.readAndReturn: Please read it and return to continue.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.summary: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Colab application. By using our services, you agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the application constitutes acceptance of any changes. The application is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the application. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Unauthorized access or use of the application is strictly prohibited. We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms.
terms.openedInBrowser: The terms and conditions have been opened in your browser.
terms.readAndReturn: Please read them and return to continue.

aadhaar.title: Aadhaar Verification
aadhaar.authorize: I authorize use of my Aadhaar for attendance verification, and agree to its secure storage under the

home.waitingMessage: till the time your team and colleague show up

attendance.locationPermissionDenied: Location permission denied. Enable it in settings.

earlyCheckout.title: Early Checkout
earlyCheckout.message: You have worked for {{hours}} hours. Minimum working hours required is 9 hours.

security.securityMessage: For security reasons, the app cannot be used while USB debugging is enabled on your device.
